headline: FedEx, DHL relocate to larger air package facilities on Europe’s edge

headline: Cummins’ distribution shift impacts 611 FedEx Supply Chain workers
summary: The engine-maker is moving work from its Tennessee-based aftermarket parts distribution operations to Indianapolis in a bid to improve efficiency.
